data.text:
@nico470011 @westaustralian And around half of those are in hospital for different reasons.
If you break an arm and have had covid recently you're in that column.

@frewen_g @westaustralian What was the point that you were trying to make then?

"Get with the times 
I’m a 69 year old Victorian and haven’t had Covid 
Am I just lucky ???"
@colonelmattyman @westaustralian That’s not what I said as I know lots I people who have had Covid
@TheUrbanExile @charlese62 @westaustralian No one is asking you to wear a mask at home or in your own car, especially if you live or travel alone.

@belindasmilne @charlese62 @westaustralian I've been vaccinated. I wore a mask. I still got the coronavirus. No, I'm not going to stay home in front of my computer and certainly not wearing a mask while I'm alone in the house.
@kttxus @westaustralian As he said I think he actually didn't want to see hundreds of people dying. I'm with him on that

@nico470011 @westaustralian All I see here is a consistently reducing number of people on ventilators and in ICU? Remember, Covid hospitalisations also include people already in the hospital who test positive....many of whom are long term.

@TheUrbanExile @charlese62 @westaustralian So, you’d rather stay home forever and sit in front of your computer than get vaccinated and wear a mask when you go out? 

That’s sad. Wouldn’t want your life.
@belindasmilne @charlese62 @westaustralian Fine. Sit in front of your computer eating your delivered food for another twenty years. Just don't force it on us.
@AntsyNegs @andrew544 @westaustralian Load of BS....we don't need masks or mandates. Freedom is what we need
